page.title: 13Law & Order
page.content: The nearest Police station is in Knighton and apart from an occasional police car on the road from Knighton to Clun there is neither sight of nor need of law enforcement. The only crime is the odd poaching of rabbits and pheasants, which is tolerated by the farmers and actively discouraged by the gamekeeper on the Stanage Estate. There has been an increase in sheep and cattle rustling in the border counties recently, but the last theft reported within this area was six years ago when 11 lambs were stolen.
